Description.Name: LAMcademy LAM Commander Appointment
Description.Details: Tired of piloting a sluggishly slow grounded 'Mech while everything else hurtles past you? Well then, Wham-Ba-LAM has the perfect solution for you: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLAM],LAM]] Pilot Training. An appointment to Wham-Ba-LAM's LAMcademy Piloting School will reward you with the knowledge of the skills needed to pilot a LAM. This training course, supplemented by neurostimuli and training simulators, and taught by our very own Black Betty, can be yours for no more than ¢750,000. Your tuition fee covers all costs associated with your training including room and board for up to 6 months. Stop letting your lethargic 'Mech affect your performance on the battlefield! WARNING! Tuition costs ¢750,000 and the Commander will not be available for up to 6 months. Applicant MUST have prior 'Mech experience. Slots are limited, so only ONE pilot may attend at a time. Our reps are not responsible if you do not have the funds to pay the tuition. Avoid buying until you have a proper bankroll. NOT ALL APPLICANTS WILL BE ACCEPTED! LAM Training is dangerous. Accidents do happen and Wham-Ba-LAM's LAMcademy Piloting School will not be held responsible for any injuries sustained during training.
